entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
